title: Australia: secrets of the land down under
creator_credit: International Video Network and Chip Duncan
brief_description: Begin your tour of vast Australia in Sydney, then head to the Blue Mountains, where the squawks of wild parrots are drowned out by Wentworth Falls. Visit Canberra the federal capital, Melbourne, the nation’s financial and cultural centre and then travel across the continent to Perth. Watch the blazing sun paint Ayer’s Rock blood red and complete your visit with stops at Brisbane and the Great Barrier Reef.
